name: Starfish PR
description: Founded in 2002, the Starfish PR team enjoys working with a wide spectrum of clients who inspire us. From nonprofit organizations to industry leaders, we call what we do "renegade" public relations because we do whatever it takes to tell our clients' stories. Media relations, digital content, social media strategy and website marketing are just pieces of the puzzle; we know our approach must be creative, crafty and courageous to stay ahead of the ever-changing media landscape.
